dataList.dlg: Aight~ Let's get this done quickly and get some grub, 'kay~?
First one to finish gets some tasty food! Of course~ the tab's on the company!
They'll all be minced meat by the end of it... Is there a better way?
Yeesh... You guys alright? You're losing a lot of blood.
Over there! That one's stumbling!
Eegh... You could've tried dodging it like, this!
Nice! That's one down!
Oh boy... Dante... Guess you got work to do, huh...?
Huuh, we might lose if we don't watch out... Dante, you got any good ideas?
Mmm~ We can deal with this and get back on the bus in no time, yeah?
I'm getting a bad feeling... Haah, this might be my last breath for this life...
H-Here comes a big one... Dante! You gotta tell the others!
Hey, that's... up to something, isn't it?
A perfect hit! That felt good to watch~
You sure that's how it's done...? It didn't look like it hurt at all?
Oh~ That was clever, Dante! It was real nice!
Mmh... I don't think even I would've done that... You tired, Dante?
Ngh... They're getting all pumped up, did they have some meat...?
Look at 'em, all weary and flustered. Stomach turned over?
Ohh... I'm full of energy! Dante! Let's go and kick 'em down!
Mm... My pals aren't doing so well...
Yeah! Broke a part down!
Fuhu, look at it, all tattered! That did a good number on it, yeah?
Oh gosh! Didn't that hurt...?
That buddy over there looks like they have one foot in the grave... Will they be alright?
Wow~ That was one heck of an attack. Worth celebrating, don't you think~?
You were awesome just now~ I bet even that grumpy guy Vergil will have to give you credit.
All that with just one swing~! That was pretty cool, huh?
Ah, ah. Do I speak into this thing? Hi~ I'm Rodya~
